billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

title: Requires a certain class (J-2) of residential buildings in New York city to have emergency lighting
summary: Requires a certain class (J-2) of residential buildings in New York city to have emergency lighting in like manner as a certain other class (J-1) of residential buildings.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring emergency lighting or illumination in certain residential buildings
